title: Moonlight Serenade with the Billionaire
description: She knows he has an agenda, and she has hers as well. Just how far will each go to get their way?In a world that’s constantly pushing the next new thing, Annie Reynolds finds beauty and inspiration in the history, vintage clothing, and a special love for big band swing music. Also a caregiver for an aging aunt, Annie finds herself championing a cause to protect Aunt Martha’s home in one of Seattle’s oldest buildings.Billionaire real estate investor Dexter Bolt loves nothing more than a city skyline dotted with cranes—a sign of a booming economy. With his eye on his great-grandfather’s fifteen-story “skyscraper,” Dex is hyped to gut and rebuild it, and he’s not used to letting anything get in his way.Trouble brews when Dexter discovers the elderly woman living in his building and he goes head-to-head with her beautiful niece. But an iron-clad lease means his threats don’t work, so Dexter takes a different approach to freeing up his romancing Annie in an attempt to influence her aunt.Opposites attract as Dex and Annie try to distract each other from their goals, but will love become the common ground they’re both looking for?A sweet, clean and wholesome billionaire romance novel that you won't want to put down.You can read as a standalone, but don't miss out on these other stories set in Billionaire Bachelor Cove!Family Dinners with the BillionaireTen Dates with the BillionaireCamping with the Billionaire
author: Amberlee Day
